name: Hello, Shadow!
description:
Hello, Shadow! is a game where you'll need to copy the poses made by a mysterious shadow (that isn't that mysterious if you've met me irl before) as fast as you can. The more poses you mimic during the 60 seconds mark, the more points you get.

Although this is a single player experience, you can still compete with your friends, once at a time, to see who gets the high score.
